if  1 xmr = 80 usd
1000 hashes = 0.00000431 usd

(only mobile 100%)
	6.26 - 21500
	6.36 - 25250 >>  3750 =  0.0000161 usd 

(only laptop 100%)
	6.55 - 27136 / 0.000001462638
	7.05 - 34816 / 0.000001876592 >> 7680 = 0.0000331 usd

(laptop & mobile 100%)
	7.11 - 34816 / 0.000001876592
	7.21 - 48384 / 0.000002607911 >>  13568 = 0.0000585 usd

(only laptop 50%)
